summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Health, Education and Welfare providing for financial assistance for an Upward Bound Project designed to generate skills and motivation necessary for success in Education beyond high school for enrollees from low-income background who have inadequate secondary preparation; establishing a position of Office Assistance within the Department of Human Resouces; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
